name: Late Stalkers
description:
In Late Stalkers, stalk your neighbours, but don't be stalked back!

  • Use your mouse to select an awaken neighbour to stalk
  • Press the left mouse button to stalk and score
  • Beware of shiny eyes! Press the right mouse button to close the curtain and protect yourself.

Made in 4 hours, live on twitch, for the Trijam #67

Code, art and design : Géraud Zucchini

Music : Antoine Druaux
